name: Rust Analyzer LSP
description: Rust language server for Claude Code, providing code intelligence and analysis.
longDescription: Integrates `rust-analyzer` as a language server for Rust files (`.rs`). Provides code intelligence, completions, go-to-definition, find references, and static analysis. Install via `rustup component add rust-analyzer` (recommended), `brew install rust-analyzer` (macOS), or your system package manager.
